Class RoomMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • Menu
      • RoomMenu

  • public class RoomMenu
extends Menu
    RoomMenu is a sub class of Menu class, which handles all the Room in the hotel.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Li Jin Quan, Lee Jian Hao, Chen Xing Yu, Kok Jia Hui

    • Method Detail

      • roomMenu

        public static void roomMenu(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuList)
                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method directs the user to the Room Menu.
        Parameters:
        guestList - - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - - This list contains all the reservations details.
        serviceList - - This list contains all the room services ordered by the Guest.
        paymentList - - This list contains the Payment rates of the hotel.
        menuList - - This list contains all the Menu items in the system.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • printRoomMenu

        public static void printRoomMenu()
        This method prints the Room Menu to inform the users of the options.

      • searchRoomByName

        public static void searchRoomByName(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList)
        This method prints details of the room based on the Guest name given by the user.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.

      • searchRoomByNo

        public static void searchRoomByNo(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        This method prints details of the room based on the room ID given by the user.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.

        public static void updateRoom(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)

      • checkIn

        public static void checkIn(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                           java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method asks for the method of check in.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • walkInCheckIn

        public static void walkInCheckIn(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method allows Guest to check in without reservation.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • reservationCheckIn

        public static void reservationCheckIn(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList)
        This method allows Guest to check in only if they made reservation.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.

      • checkOut

        public static void checkOut(java.util.ArrayList<Guest> guestList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservationList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<RoomService> serviceList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Payment> paymentList,
                            java.util.ArrayList<MenuItem> menuList)
        This method allows Guest to check out. roomList, reservationList and serviceList will be updated accordingly upon checking out. Bill invoice will be calculated and displayed based on the paymentList and serviceList.
        Parameters:
        guestList - This list contains the details of all the guest registered in the system.
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.
        reservationList - This list contains all the reservations details.
        serviceList - This list contains all the room services ordered by the Guest.
        paymentList - This list contains the Payment rates of the hotel.
        menuList - This list contains all the Menu items in the system.

      • printRoomReport

        public static void printRoomReport(java.util.ArrayList<Room> roomList)
        This method prints out relevant details of the room based on the Room Status.
        Parameters:
        roomList - This list contains the details of all the room in the system.

      • printRooms

        public static void printRooms(java.util.ArrayList<Room> occuList)
        This method prints out details of OCCUPIED room stored in occuList.
        Parameters:
        occuList - This list contains Room object that is OCCUPIED.
